attributes.action: Equal pay/rights for self employed workers during the corona virus outbreak.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do it because it’s morally the right thing to do, why are self employed workers in this country been treated differently, we are been punished, we are been discriminated against and it’s not acceptable and it’s about time things changed. Self employed workers have got enough to worry about the majority of the time, without now worrying about money issues during the corona virus outbreak.
attributes.background: I would like the government to offer the same rights and pay to all workers on the country regardless wether they are self employed or employed PAYE by a company during the corona virus outbreak.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced support for self-employed individuals: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/chancellor-gives-support-to-millions-of-self-employed-individuals

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
